teaser: First up, Marketplace's David Weinberg joins us from the floor of the E3 Gaming Expo. Plus, Zach Seward, senior editor at the online magazine Quartz, talks about how cord cutters can watch the World Cup matches online. Continuing the Data on our Data series, we'll discuss the $278 million budgeted for the NSA to reimburse telecomm companies for the cost of surveillance.
title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, June 12, 2014
